recipe.title: Grapefruit Scouring Scrub Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Pulverise the grapefruit peels in a coffee grinder or a blender.
In a medium bowl, combine ½ cup (60 g) of grapefruit powder with the baking soda and salt.
Pour into a resealable closed container.
